New Records: Jason Roy and Jos Buttler set up the third highest first-wicket partnership for England against India in T20 internationals.
Key Match Events: Bowlers attack before Jason Roy's assault helped England to a comfortable eight-wicket victory over India.
Shreyas Iyer struck 67 off 48-balls including 8-fours & a six.
Jofra Archer took 3-wickets for 23-runs in 4-overs including a maiden.
England chased 130-2 in 15.3 overs with Jason Roy scoring 49 off 32-balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Jofra Archer named Player of the match for his brilliant bowling performance.
